form-newsletter.name: Name

description.title: üå±  A Project for Sustainable Gardening
description.description: Swissonal is a project dedicated to empowering Swiss gardeners, plant lovers, and anyone passionate about growing their own food. Our mission is to promote sustainable and healthy gardening practices throughout Switzerland, providing the tools and knowledge needed for a thriving garden all year round.

purpose.title: üåç  Our Purpose
purpose.description: Encouraging you to grow your own food with your health and the world in mind

who.title: ‚ú®  Who
who.description: Swissonal was created by EM ITALICOP BRUNA
who.description2: a designer and programmer and gardening enthusiast from Switzerland

inspiration.title: üîé  What Inspired Swissonal?
inspiration.description: Bruna often found herself frustrated by the lack of a centralized source for planting information specific to Switzerland. She had to navigate through multiple websites, yet none offered comprehensive, Swiss-focused guidance on what to plant and when.
inspiration.description 2: 'Why not use my skills to solve a problem that so many people face?'
inspiration.description4: And thus, Swissonal was born ‚Äì a one-stop resource designed to simplify and enhance the gardening experience for Swiss plant enthusiasts.
